meteringrange: EV 0 - 20 (Digital ESP metering, Centre weighted average metering, Spot metering)
exposurebracketing: 2, 3 or 5 frames in 0.3/0.7/1.0EV steps selectable, 7 frames in 0.3/0.7EV steps selectable
weight: 425g with BLN-1 battery and memory card, 373g body only
flashsyncspeed: 1/250 sec or less depending on flash models or flash mode. FL-LM2: 1/250 sec., FL-50R: 1/180 sec., Exept FL-50R: 1/200 sec., Super FP: 1/125-1/4000 sec.
memorycardtype: SD Memory Card, SDHC, SDXC, UHS-I compatible, Eye-Fi Card compatible (class 6 or higher is recommended for movie shooting)
meteringmodes: (1) Digital ESP metering (324-area multi pattern metering) (2) Center weighted average metering (3) Spot metering (approx. 1% of the viewfinder screen. Highlight / shadow bias spot metering are available)
wbbracketing: 2, 3 or 5 frames in 0.3/0.7/1.0EV steps selectable, 7 frames in 0.3/0.7EV steps selectable
focusmodes: Single AF (S-AF) / Continuous AF (C-AF) / Manual Focus (MF) / S-AF + MF / AF tracking (C-AF + TR)
dimensionswxhxd: 121 mm (W) x 89.6mm (H) x 41.9mm (D) (CIPA guideline compliant, excluding protrusions)
scenemodes: Portrait, e-Portrait, Landscape, Landscape + Portrait, Sport, Night, Night + Portrait, Children, High Key, Low Key, DIS mode, Macro, Nature Macro, Candle, Sunset, Documents, Panorama, Fireworks, Beach & Snow, Fisheye Effect, Wide-Angle, Macro, 3D
shootingmodes: (1) iAuto (2) P: Programme AE (Programme shift can be performed) (3) A: Aperture priority AE (4) S: Shutter priority AE (5) M: Manual (6) Scene select AE (7) Art Filter
